channel.title: Need help running server
channel.description:
Alright, i just started making my own server and i got all the portforwarding and no-ip done. My problem is every time i run the server and login its freezes and i cant move anywhere then it disconnects. I have tried a few different sources but all of them disconnect after the first few seconds.
Any ideas what can be causing it?

item.title: Need help running server
item.dc:creator: @jarrad jarrad
item.description:
@jarrad wrote:

Have you set your Enviromental Variables correctly?

Read full topic
